title: Made the leap to Amazon Web Services!
body:
It's time for a change. I'm leaving Boeing Defense (nee Liquid Robotics), with many fond memories. Today I start a new Adventure at Amazon Web Services. I'll mostly be working on IoT-related projects, but I'm sure to get dragged into projects all over the map. Including OpenJDK.

This blog has become almost totally stagnant. These days, I mostly use Facebook for posting personal stuff, and Twitter for work-related stuff.
